oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Framed image of two brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed color image of two brothers, one pictured in a Union cavalry coat. The family story is that one brother was Union and the other Confederate; however, in the image both brothers appear to be in Union dress. Brothers are relatives of Reva, Polly, and Vola Taylor from the French Broad area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
